summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5379 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 11, Bell and Denny's Addition, being the alley between Elliott Avenue and Western Avenue, from Clay Street to Cedar Street; by grading and paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 65551, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
